title: Mahou Wo Sutetai Onna No Ko
alternative_title: The Enchanted Girl and the Secret Roses ; The Girl Who Wants to Get Rid of This Magic ; 魔法を捨てたい女の子
status: The Enchanted Girl and the Secret Roses ; The Girl Who Wants to Get Rid of This Magic ; 魔法を捨てたい女の子
description:
Description :
        When shut-in otaku Honnezaka Arumi gets thrown into an elite all-girls boarding school, life becomes hell on earth. And to make matters worse, each student at the academy gains a special kind of magic—or more like a curse, really. Arumi suddenly finds herself blurting out thoughts she never would've dreamed of saying aloud before. Luckily, there's a way to rid oneself of this magic. But unlucky for her, it involves a long and hard process.

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3: Grumpy Of Crystal Palace
